verses.verse: And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H3254><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, and her name <S%H8034><s%> was Keturah <S%H6989><s%>.
And she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Zimran <S%H2175><s%>, and Jokshan <S%H3370><s%>, and Medan <S%H4091><s%>, and Midian <S%H4080><s%>, and Ishbak <S%H3435><s%>, and Shuah <S%H7744><s%>.

And Jokshan <S%H3370><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dedan <S%H1719><s%> were Asshurim <S%H805><s%>, and Letushim <S%H3912><s%>, and Leummim <S%H3817><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>: Ephah <S%H5891><s%>, and Epher <S%H6081><s%>, and Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Abida <S%H28><s%>, and Eldaah <S%H420><s%>. All these were the children <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah <S%H6989><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> all that he had unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>.

But unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the concubines <S%H6370><s%>, that Abraham <S%H85><s%> had <S%H85><s%>, Abraham gave <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%>; and he sent them away <S%H7971><s%> from Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, while he yet lived <S%H2416><s%>, eastward <S%H6924><s%>, unto the east <S%H6924><s%> country <S%H776><s%>.

And these are the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s life <S%H2416><s%> which he lived <S%H2425><s%>, a hundred <S%H3967><s%> threescore and fifteen <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age <S%H7872><s%>, an old man <S%H2205><s%>, and full <S%H7649><s%> of years <S%H622><s%>, and was gathered to his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zohar <S%H6714><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>;

the field <S%H7704><s%> which Abraham <S%H85><s%> purchased <S%H7069><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>: there was Abraham <S%H85><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%>, and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, that God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>: and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> Beer-lahai <S%H883><s%>-roi.

Now these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, whom Hagar <S%H1904><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, Sarah <S%H8283><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%>, bare <S%H3205><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>:

and these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, by their names <S%H8034><s%>, according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>: the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%>; and Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, and Adbeel <S%H110><s%>, and Mibsam <S%H4017><s%>,
and Mishma <S%H4927><s%>, and Dumah <S%H1746><s%>, and Massa <S%H4854><s%>,
Hadad <S%H2316><s%>, and Tema <S%H8485><s%>, Jetur <S%H3195><s%>, Naphish <S%H5305><s%>, and Kedemah <S%H6929><s%>:

these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, and these are their names <S%H8034><s%>, by their villages <S%H2691><s%>, and by their encampments <S%H2918><s%>; twelve <S%H8147><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> according to their nations <S%H523><s%>.

And these are the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they dwelt <S%H7931><s%> from Havilah <S%H2341><s%> unto Shur <S%H7793><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, as thou goest <S%H935><s%> toward Assyria <S%H804><s%>: he abode <S%H5307><s%> over against <S%H6440><s%> all his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>: Abraham <S%H85><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%>:

and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he took <S%H3947><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%> of Paddan-aram <S%H6307><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%>, to be his wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> entreated <S%H6279><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H5227><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, because she was barren <S%H6135><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was entreated <S%H6279><s%> of him <S%H7259><s%>, and Rebekah his wife <S%H802><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> struggled together <S%H7533><s%> within her <S%H7130><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%>, If it be so <S%H2088><s%>, wherefore do I live? And she went <S%H3212><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H8147><s%>, Two nations <S%H1471><s%> are in thy womb <S%H990><s%>, And two <S%H8147><s%> peoples <S%H3816><s%> shall be separated <S%H6504><s%> from thy bowels <S%H4578><s%>: And the one people <S%H3816><s%> shall be stronger <S%H553><s%> than the other people <S%H3816><s%>; And the elder <S%H7227><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%>.
And when her days <S%H3117><s%> to be delivered <S%H3205><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>, behold <S%H8380><s%>, there were twins in her womb <S%H990><s%>.

And the first <S%H7223><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> red <S%H132><s%>, all over like a hairy <S%H8181><s%> garment <S%H155><s%>; and they called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> that came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> had hold <S%H270><s%> on Esau <S%H6215><s%>'s heel <S%H6119><s%>; and his name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was threescore <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when she bare them <S%H3205><s%>.

And the boys <S%H5288><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%>: and Esau <S%H6215><s%> was a skilful <S%H3045><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was a quiet <S%H8535><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, dwelling <S%H3427><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%>.
Now Isaac <S%H3327><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>, because he did eat <S%H6310><s%> of his venison <S%H6718><s%>: and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> boiled <S%H2102><s%> pottage <S%H5138><s%>: and Esau <S%H6215><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in from the field <S%H7704><s%>, and he was faint <S%H5889><s%>:

and Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Feed <S%H3938><s%> me <S%H4480><s%>, I pray thee, with that same <S%H122><s%> red <S%H122><s%> pottage <S%H5889><s%>; for I am faint: therefore was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Edom <S%H123><s%>.
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Sell <S%H4376><s%> me first <S%H3117><s%> thy birthright <S%H1062><s%>.
And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1980><s%>, I am about to die <S%H4191><s%>: and what profit shall the birthright do to me <S%H1062><s%>?

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Swear <S%H7650><s%> to me first <S%H3117><s%>; and he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto him <S%H4376><s%>: and he sold his birthright <S%H1062><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and pottage <S%H5138><s%> of lentils <S%H5742><s%>; and he did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%>, and rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and went his way <S%H3212><s%>: so Esau <S%H6215><s%> despised <S%H959><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%>.
